0010101100110001 0101100011110011 0 -> sum: 1000010000100100, cout: 0

0101100001111110 1011101101000000 1 -> sum: 0001001110111111, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
